description:
We are looking for experienced test automation engineer to join an ongoing project as a leader for small and medium projects. The job assumes working in a large investment bank in an international team operating in a global environment collaborating closely with other teams in UK, US and other countries. Fast career growth, foreign business trips, the opportunity to participate in a large multi-year development programme focused on the renovation of the applications responsible for the reporting of financial risks and profit&losses are the key benefits of this position.


Minimal requirements:

  • Experience of working as a software developer or automation engineer - 1 year+
  • Good knowledge of Java or C# programming languages
  • Good communication skills (ability to explain solutions proposed for juniors)
  • Good English skills (reading technical documentation, writing reports, communication with client and foreign team members)

Preferred requirements:

  • Knowledge of scripting programming languages (Groovy, Python)
  • Experience in software architecture development for small and medium systems/applications
  • Good knowledge of networks, web services
  • Experience in small frameworks creation and development
  • Knowledge of basic parts of enterprise-related stack for the platform candidate is familiar with (e.g. Spring, JMS, Security, XML+XQuery, SOAP etc)
  • Good spoken English

Responsibilities:

  • Auto tests creation (including framework development)
  • Code review and refactoring management
  • Testing tools verification, installation and troubleshooting
  • Running automated tests, verifying results and investigating issues, assisting team leader in technical analysis

Conditions:

  • The position assumes full time job in the company office
  • The salary depends on work experience, interview and tests results
name: Senior Automation Engineer / Специалист по автоматизированному тестированию
